checkAvailability

public java.util.List<Room> checkAvailability(java.util.Date start,
                                              java.util.Date end,
                                              int amount)
Description copied from class: Category
Check every room in this category for the availability in the given timespan. The goal is to return as much rooms as given in the amount-parameter. If there arent enough rooms available, we return null.

Overrides:
checkAvailability in class Category
Parameters:
start - StartDate of the availability
end - EndDate of the availability
amount - Amount of needed rooms in this category and timespan
Returns:
List of available rooms
